title: NIT Rourkela Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: The National Institute of Technology Rourkela (NIT Rourkela) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Junior Research Fellow Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech, B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for the NIT Rourkela Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the...
